maps.title: SPLIT
maps.description: If you want to go far, you’ll have to go up. A pair of sites split by an elevated center allows for rapid movement using two rope ascenders. Each site is built with a looming tower vital for control. Remember to watch above before it all blows sky-high.

maps.title: BIND
maps.description: Two sites. No middle. Gotta pick left or right. What’s it going to be then? Both offer direct paths for attackers and a pair of one-way teleporters make it easier to flank.

maps.title: HAVEN
maps.description: Beneath a forgotten monastery, a clamour emerges from rival Agents clashing to control three sites. There’s more territory to control, but defenders can use the extra real estate for aggressive pushes.

maps.title: FRACTURE
maps.description: A top secret research facility split apart by a failed radianite experiment. With defender options as divided as the map, the choice is yours: meet the attackers on their own turf or batten down the hatches to weather the assault.

maps.title: SUNSET
maps.description: A disaster at a local kingdom facility threatens to engulf the whole neighborhood. Stop at your favorite food truck then fight across the city in this traditional three lane map.

maps.title: LOTUS
maps.description: Lotus is one of the two VALORANT maps with three sites and takes place within an ancient temple in the Western Ghats of India.

maps.title: ASCENT
maps.description: The map is located in Venice, Italy, with landmarks from the city, including the Basilica of St. Mark (top right in the image above), as well as the Campanile of St. Mark (the big red tower).

maps.title: ICEBOX
maps.description: Icebox is located off the coast of Bennett Island, a remote location near Siberia.

maps.title: BREEZE
maps.description: Breeze is the closest VALORANT map to the “middle of nowhere,” but geographically, it’s closest to the Bermuda Triangle.

maps.title: ABYSS
maps.description: Abyss is VALORANT’s newest map and is located deep beneath the island of Sør-Jan in Norway. It is also the only map in the game with no outer boundaries. Each site is built with a looming tower vital for control. Remember to watch above before it all blows sky-high.
